org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.flow.mdui

Interface MetadataResolverAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter, DynamicMetadataResolverAdapter, StaticMetadataResolverAdapter

    public interface MetadataResolverAdapter
    MetadataResolverAdapter is a facade on top of the existing metadata resolution machinery that defines how metadata may be resolved.
    Since:
    4.1.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
